Plot:

 Everyday is a normal day in the small town where [Kasuga Arata] lives. However, everything changed on the day of the Black Sun, and following it, a magician appears before him. Because of this, his normal life was artificially reconstructed by a Grimoire that his childhood friend had left. Just what is the purpose of the magician coming to the town? What will he do with the Grimoire`s keepsake? Source: manga updates
